segments.text: The central Hotel , please . I have to be there by 6:00 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We shouldn't have any trouble if the traffic isn't too heavy . Is this your first trip here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I've never been here before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You haven't seen the sights yet , have you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you visit the Great Wall first ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here we are . That will be seven yuan and seventy cents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks a lot . Here's ten yuan . Keep the change .
segments.speaker: S1
